amendment.description: Amendment sought to require an application for a natural gas pipeline to include information ensuring that methane emissions will be minimized before such application can be considered for approval.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-272 to require the application for a natural gas pipeline to include information to ensure that methane emissions will be minimized before the application can be considered for approval.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 233 (Roll no. 605).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 233 (Roll no. 605).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Tonko.
